title: About Us
subtitle: The chill philosophy behind the club

blocks.heading: Our Philosophy
blocks.content:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. We believe that running should be fun, social, and completely pressure-free.

Whether you're training for a marathon or just want to escape the house on a Sunday morning, you're welcome here. We don't care about your pace – we care about showing up, having a laugh, and enjoying breakfast together afterwards.

blocks.heading: No Pressure, Just Vibes
blocks.content: Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.

blocks.heading: When & Where
blocks.content:
We meet every Sunday at **9:00 AM** at the Bingham Market Place. Look for the group of slightly tired but enthusiastic people in running gear!

After the run, we grab breakfast at one of the local cafés. It's not optional – it's the most important part of the workout.
